article_title: White House: Israeli troops are tired and need to be refit.
sentence: Last  week,  after  an  Israeli  strike  killed  seven  aid  workers  in  Gaza,  President  Joe  Biden  told  Israeli  PM  Benjamin  Netanyahu  that  the  US's  ongoing  support  for  Israel  was  dependent  on  "specific,  concrete  steps"  to  boost  aid  and  prevent  civilian  deaths  in  the  Palestinian  enclave.
